title: T-Rex Engineering REPLICATOR Analog True Tape Echo Guitar Effects Pedal with Two Playback Heads, Three Operation Modes, Tap Tempo, and Two Expression Pedal Inputs (10027)
features: The ultimate tape echo unit that captures true tape echo sound quality in a compact pedal, complete with motor, magnetic heads, and replaceable tape cartridge
Handcrafted in Denmark, the Replicator incorporates modern features making it more like a standalone instrument rather than just a sound effect
100% analog signal gives the sound an overall classic warmth
Two playback heads mounted in a fixed position in relation to the record head providing three modes of operation for long, short, or combined delay
Active tap tempo switch to tap in a delay time
description: T-REX Replicator Analog True Tape Each Pedal with Two Playback Heads, Three Operation Modes, Tap Tempo, and Two Expression Pedal Inputs.
